sqls.sql: SELECT master_code_id, master_code_key, code_category, code_value, code_description, filter_value, sequence, status, effective_from, effective_to, version FROM CM_MASTER_CODE WHERE status = 'CMSTAT001' AND effective_from < getdate() AND (effective_to >= getdate() or effective_to is null) <#if cateFilter??>AND code_category = :cateFilter</#if> <#if codeFilter??>AND master_code_key = :codeFilter</#if> <#if filterAttr??>AND filter_value = :filterAttr</#if>
